TopicTitle: Do relay satellites still function as such if their probe cores are in "Hibernation" mode?

Articles.Content: Pretty much the same as title. I launched a relay constellation and wanted to conserve power because I also heard that relay take a bunch of EC when in use.
The game doesn’t check power on the relay, only the vessel transmitting. Relays will work regardless of whether the probe core is active or even if it has no power at all.
